segments.text: I'm looking through the open window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is a picture of perfect calm and tidiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a pleasant path bordered by low bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It truly seems like a peaceful, serene day out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But what a stark contrast to the interior of this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is a waterfall, pouring water onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A large puddle is forming around the unsuspecting woman's feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children are engaged in their precarious cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The normalcy outside clashes so dramatically with the impending chaos within.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if two different worlds exist side-by-side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tranquil garden remains untouched by the unfolding mishaps.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels a bit sad that such a lovely day is marred by such unawareness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight streaming in only highlights the gathering mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
